extension.news: v2.0.24a Changes for the guide to return to correct channel and timeslot after streaming

extension.summary: All the best from channelpear.com
extension.description:
The channel PEAR media database is 100% maintained by users like you! Share media sources with fellow channel PEAR users and discover a whole world of live streaming channels from around the globe! http://channelpear.com You can now enter your custom Kodi URL in the addon settings. You can get your custom Kodi URL from your library at https://channelpear.com/library/ (must be logged in - click on "Pair Device" and select Kodi).
This addon is based on code from LiveStreamspro from Shani. All credit to Shani and other devs involved.
